Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: List out the events from both logs with their timestamps: Log A events: 1. 2023-10-10T10:00:00Z Order Received Order#1234 2. 2023-10-10T10:01:30Z Order Validated Order#1234 3. 2023-10-10T10:02:00Z Payment Processed Order#1234 4. 2023-10-10T10:05:00Z Item Shipped Order#1234 5. 2023-10-10T10:20:00Z Item Delivered Order#1234 Log B events: 1. 2023-10-10T09:59:58Z OrderReceived Order#1234 u45 r10 Event captured at warehouse system 2. 2023-10-10T10:01:29Z OrderValidation Order#1234 u12 r10 Cross-check inventory 3. 2023-10-10T10:02:05Z PaymentCheck Order#1234 u12 r99 Payment gateway delay 4. 2023-10-10T10:03:00Z Quality Check Order#1234 u45 r11 Random inspection 5. 2023-10-10T10:05:02Z Shipping Order#1234 u45 r10 Package handed to courier

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: All events in chronological order: 09:59:58Z Log B OrderReceived 10:00:00Z Log A Order Received 10:01:29Z Log B OrderValidation 10:01:30Z Log A Order Validated 10:02:00Z Log A Payment Processed 10:02:05Z Log B PaymentCheck 10:03:00Z Log B Quality Check 10:05:00Z Log A Item Shipped 10:05:02Z Log B Shipping 10:20:00Z Log A Item Delivered

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: The prompt says if timestamps differ by less than 2 seconds consider them the same event. For first event difference 2 seconds exactly so borderline. For Order Validated difference 1 second less than 2 seconds merge. For Payment difference 5 seconds more than 2 seconds no merge. For Item Shipped difference 2 seconds borderline.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Possible matches: Order Received and OrderReceived diff 2s, Order Validated and OrderValidation diff 1s, Payment Processed and PaymentCheck diff 5s, Item Shipped and Shipping diff 2s. Quality Check no match. Item Delivered no match.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Notice pattern in differences: Log B often slightly earlier for Order events by 2s or 1s. For Payment Log B later by 5s inconsistent. Use sequence order to pair: Log A1 with Log B1, A2 B2, A3 B3, A4 B5 skipping Quality Check.

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: Strictly less than 2 seconds only Order Validated merges but that incomplete. Consider sequence and practical tolerance for 2s differences despite strict rule.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Final decision merge Order Received despite 2s as same type close match, merge Order Validated 1s, not merge Payment 5s beyond tolerance, merge Item Shipped 2s close, Quality Check and Item Delivered separate.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Define merged attributes: for Order Received use primary timestamp Log A include Log B user resource notes. Similarly for others. List in chronological order using primary timestamps: Order Received 10:00:00, Order Validated 10:01:30, Payment Processed 10:02:00, PaymentCheck 10:02:05, Quality Check 10:03:00, Item Shipped 10:05:00, Item Delivered 10:20:00.
